name: Mage Slayer
description: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

abilities.name: Mage Slayer
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks deal damage over time to the target, and reduce the target's spell damage output.
notes: The debuff from successive attacks on the same target does not stack but refreshes the duration
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage
Applies generic outgoing damage reduction on the affected target. Stacks additively with other sources of generic outgoing damage manipulation
Affects spell damage the affected enemy deals. Does not reduce damage flagged as HP removal
Does not work against wards, buildings, and allied units

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant additional main attack damage
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 40%
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.8%
